overview: Christopher, a gay teenager who is about to turn 16, wishes to have his first encounter with a man. He has decided to leave prejudices behind and assume his orientation freely, proposing to the boy he usually spies when he plays sports: Renato. However, there is a problem: the person Christopher has fallen in love with doesn't love him back. Is it possible that Renato will listen to him?
title: Y tú... quién eres?
